channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Dynatrace Application Monitoring Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Dynatrace Application Monitoring Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10463|2024-08-04T22:24:18.511Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dynatrace%20application%20monitoring%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Dynatrace Application Monitoring Plugin allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-10462|2024-08-04T22:24:18.554Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dynatrace%20application%20monitoring%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Dynatrace Application Monitoring Plugin 2.1.3 and earlier allowed attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-10461|2024-08-04T22:24:18.520Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dynatrace%20application%20monitoring%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Dynatrace Application Monitoring Plugin 2.1.3 and earlier stored credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they could be viewed by users with access to the master file system.
